summary: Example implementation of Graph Attention Networks (GAT) using DGL and PyTorch, including command‑line scripts to train and evaluate GAT models on standard citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed) and on the Protein‑Protein Interaction (PPI) dataset for node classification.
business_intent: Showcase how to apply GAT for node classification tasks, provide reference code for researchers and developers to reproduce benchmark results and integrate attention‑based graph neural networks into their projects.
